title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight - Harry Potter has arrived
description:
In this video we are going to look at Harry Potter addon which are made available by one of the community members via flightsim.to. This addon contains two folders which both need to be added to the community folder of MSFS 2020.

All sceneries being added are closely located to the Glenfinnan viaduct which is part of MSFS 2020 World Update 3. Items being added to the scenery include:

- Hogwarts
- Quidditch Stadium 
- Hotel and parking spots

The addon can be downloaded via the site below:
https://flightsim.to/file/13744/hogwarts-poudlard-better-version

If you also want to use the Air Creation 582 SL used in the video download your own copy via the site below:
https://flightsim.to/file/13218/air-creation-582sl
